title: Linux o Android App per Chromebook
content: Buongiorno, ho un Chromebook Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 3 basato su Celeron N4500 con 8GB di RAM. Devo decidere se intallare Firefox in versione Linux oppure Android. A parte le differenze di funzionalità, quale versione è più veloce e leggera su Chrome OS del Chromebook? Grazie e saluti, Stefano
creator: stefano20

title: have a lot of Bible study
content: I couldn't open my Bible study files

title: Password does not sync
content: Hi, my password saved on this pc does not sync with logins on other devices, both pc and android firefox

title: Mozilla cuelga el equipo con linux debian bullseye
content: En varia ocaciones utilizando mozilla la version 106.0.5 me cuelga el equipo y no hay manera de sacarlo de ahi la unica opcion es resetear el equipo. Me ha estado pasando en las ultimas actualizaciones
creator: eduardoantonioparejo

title: A window with all its tabs dissappeared, won't show on restart...
content: Merely typing an email when the tab and window it was in shut down (am using linux mint and most recent FF build.) I have difficulty understanding programmer directions as typically given but can follow a path > to files and folders. I found firefox old backups and sessions folder but none of the session restore files are dated, won't open and won't restore. I wish there was a straight-forward path to restore "my sessions" when issues develop. Just show me where the file path > where the files are > and what to click. Thank you.
creator: germeten1
